product_name: Timex Expedition Fast Wrap Watch - Women's Mid
long_description: The adventure-ready Timex Expedition Fast Wrap watch features a timer, 3 alarms, backlight, dual time zones and a Fast Wrap strap for easy wear. 3 easy-to-set daily alarms keep you on schedule. INDIGLO(R) backlight illuminates the display with the touch of a button for easy use in the dark. Fast Wrap watch band offers comfort and enhanced adjustability for the perfect fit over or under clothing. Water resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The adventure-ready Timex Expedition Fast Wrap watch features a timer, 3 alarms, backlight, dual time zones and a Fast Wrap strap for easy wear.
